local_schema.short_desc: Run the command in a terminal
local_schema.longdesc: True if the command used to handle this type of URL should be run in a terminal.
The command used to handle "cai" URLs, if enabled.

local_schema.short_desc: Whether the specified command should handle "cai" URLs
local_schema.longdesc: True if the command specified in the "command" key should handle "cai" URLs.
